comment: The SVG <text> element draws a graphics element consisting of text. It's possible to apply a gradient, pattern, clipping path, mask, or filter to <text>, like any other SVG graphics element.

attributes.name: x
attributes.comment: x position of the starting point of the text baseline.

attributes.name: y
attributes.comment: y position of the starting point of the text baseline.

attributes.name: dx
attributes.comment: shifts the text position horizontally from a previous text element.

attributes.name: dy
attributes.comment: shifts the text position vertically from a previous text element.

attributes.name: rotate
attributes.comment: rotates orientation of each individual glyph. can rotate glyphs individually.

attributes.name: lengthAdjust
attributes.comment: how the text is stretched or compressed to fit the width defined by the textLength attribute.

attributes.name: textLength
attributes.comment: a width that the text should be scaled to fit.
